author: zhaobenny
description: Utilize OpenAI to select the 'best' react for a message
install_msg:
Quick startup guide: 
 1) Set (preferably paid account) OpenAI key using [p]set api openai api_key,INSERT_API_KEY 
 2) Use [p]aiemoteadmin to see owner cmds, add a whitelisted channel as server admin using [p]aiemote allow <#channel> 
 3) Have users optin using [p]aiemote optin
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users, but chat messages be sent to OpenAI to generate an emoji selection. Please refer to: <https://openai.com/policies/privacy-policy>.
